item.title: Add Downtime Monkey
item.description:
https://pingmeter.com/ - 5 uptime monitors with 10 minutes interval. Monitor SSH, HTTP, HTTPS, and any custom TCP ports.
https://downtimemonkey.com/ - 60 uptime monitors, 5 minute interval. Email, Slack alerts.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://stellate.co/ - Stellate is blazing fast, reliable CDN for your GraphQL API and Free for 2 services.

item.title: GraphCDN removed & Stellate added
item.description: https://stellate.co/ - Stellate is free for indie hackers and individual developers. Your GraphQL API. Blazing fast and reliable.

item.title: Added Keploy under Testing
item.description: https://keploy.io/) - Keploy is a functional testing toolkit for developers. It generates E2E tests for APIs (KTests) along with mocks or stubs(KMocks - Keploy is a functional testing toolkit for developers. It generates E2E tests for APIs (KTests) along with mocks or stubs(KMocks) by recording real API calls. It is free for Open Source.

item.title: Mentioning free resouces for Mattermost
item.description: https://mattermost.com/ - Secure collaboration for technical teams. Free plan with unlimited channels, playbooks, boards, users, 10GB storage and more.

item.title: Added Mattermost
